IT - System linkage issue.definition: System integration or linkage between modules or systems is broken or not functioning correctly
examples: Data not flowing from SAP to Anaplan
System linkage missing for cost center

IT - System Access issue.definition: User cannot access system due to authorization, login, or permission problems
examples: User unable to access Anaplan workspace
User not able to login to system

IT - System Version issue.definition: Version mismatch or incorrect version used in system

IT - Data entry handholding.definition: User needs IT support to enter or update data correctly in system
examples: Support required to enter planning data

IT - Master Data/ mapping issue.definition: Mapping or master data configuration issue in system

User - Mapping missing.definition: User has not provided required mapping information
examples: User has not shared mapping file
Mapping not provided by business team

User - Master data delayed input.definition: User delayed providing required master data
examples: User has not submitted master data

User - Logic changes during ABP.definition: User requested change in planning logic or calculation
examples: User requested change in planning logic

User - Master data incorporation in syst.definition: User provided new master data that needs to be added to system
symptoms: new entity needs to be added
examples: New cost center needs to be created

User - System Knowledge Gap.definition: User does not know how to use system properly
symptoms: user unsure how to use system
examples: User needs help using planning module
User not aware of system process

User - Logic mistakes in excel vs system.definition: Mismatch between Excel logic and system logic
symptoms: values different in excel and system
